name: Pac-Trump-Man
description:
BUILD THE WALL!

Its enough, the president himself has to build the wall, but first he needs to collect all wall parts in the white house.
But be careful mexican special agents are trying to intervene!

This game was created in 1 hour by 1 person for the "Weekly Hour Game Jam".

Nothing in this game is meant to be offensive, its just the game jams theme.
